actions.committee: Committee on Government Reform, and in addition to the Committee on Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Government Reform, and in addition to the Committee on Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Government Management, Information and Technology.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Readiness.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Government Management, Information and Technology

official_title: To require that each Government agency post monthly, on its public Web site, certain statistical data relating to Federal sector equal employment opportunity complaints filed with such agency, and for other purposes.
short_title: Equal Employment Opportunity Complaint Data Disclosure Act
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Equal Employment Opportunity Complaint Data Disclosure Act - Directs each Federal executive agency to post on its public Web site specified summary statistical data relating to equal employment opportunity complaints filed with such agency by employees or former employees, or applicants for employment with, such agency.Directs the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission to post on its public Web site summary statistical data relating to: (1) hearings requested before an administrative judge of the Commission on such complaints; and (2) appeals filed with the Commission from final agency actions on such complaints.

titles.title: Equal Employment Opportunity Complaint Data Disclosure Act

To require that each Government agency post monthly, on its public Web site, certain statistical data relating to Federal sector equal employment opportunity complaints filed with such agency, and for other purposes.
